title: Email
description: Set this action to display your email contact information instantly when the card is scanned, allowing quick and easy email communication with your contacts.

title: WhatsApp
description: Set this action to display your WhatsApp contact info upon scanning, enabling others to message you directly through WhatsApp for seamless communication.

title: SMS
description: Set this action to prompt a pre-filled SMS message to your phone number when the card is scanned, making it easy for contacts to reach you via text.

title: Call
description: Set this action to instantly display your phone number for a quick call when the card is scanned, providing an easy way for contacts to reach you directly by phone.

title: Contact Card
description: Set this action to show a digital contact card, including your essential details like phone number, email, and address, enabling contacts to save your info quickly.

title: About Me
description: Set this action to share a brief biography or personal information when the card is scanned, providing contacts with a quick overview of who you are and what you do.

title: Social Builder
description: Set this action to link all your social media profiles in one place, enabling others to connect with you across multiple platforms from a single scan.

title: Profile
description: Set this action to display your professional profile or resume details, giving contacts an immediate snapshot of your career, skills, and accomplishments.

title: Product Catalogue
description: Set this action to showcase a catalog of your products or services when the card is scanned, allowing contacts to view what you offer at a glance.

title: Booking
description: Set this action to provide a link to your scheduling or booking page, making it easy for contacts to arrange meetings or appointments with you.

title: PayPal
description: Set this action to display your PayPal link for quick payments, making it convenient for others to pay you directly upon scanning the card.

title: Link Tree
description: Set this action to share a customizable link tree, offering multiple links in one place so contacts can easily access different resources or profiles.

title: URL
description: Set this action to display a specific URL when scanned, guiding contacts to any webpage or resource of your choosing for easy access.

title: Date Trigger
description: Set this action to trigger a reminder or important event notification, allowing you to share key dates or milestones with your contacts.

title: Event
description: Set this action to display details about an upcoming event, including time, location, and RSVP information, so contacts can easily join or save it to their calendar.
